sources.title: HubHeroes Podcast - Official Page
sources.summary: George B. Thomas co-hosts the HubHeroes Podcast alongside Max Cohen and Devyn Bellamy of HubSpot, and Liz Moorehead. The podcast serves as 'your backstage pass to strategies that drive results,' covering HubSpot and Inbound topics that help streamline processes, communication, and revenue streams.
keyPoints: Weekly podcast covering HubSpot strategies and inbound marketing
Co-hosted with Max Cohen, Devyn Bellamy, and Liz Moorehead
Covers Marketing Hub, Sales Hub, Service Hub, and CMS tools
Features the brightest minds in the industry
quotes: Your backstage pass to strategies that drive results
What it takes to build impactful marketing strategies, grow with purpose, and lead with authenticity

sources.title: HubHeroes Podcast - Apple Podcasts
sources.summary: The HubHeroes Podcast on Apple Podcasts featuring George B. Thomas and team discussing HubSpot tools, inbound marketing, and business growth strategies.

sources.title: HubHeroes - Sidekick Strategies
sources.summary: George B. Thomas's author page on Sidekick Strategies HubHeroes Podcast, showcasing his role as creator and host of the podcast.
keyPoints: George is the creator of the HubHeroes Podcast
Over 10 years of HubSpot training and implementation experience
quotes: George's office, mic, and on any given day, his clothing is orange

sources.title: Beyond Your Default Podcast - Official Website
sources.summary: George B. Thomas hosts 'Beyond Your Default,' a personal growth podcast co-hosted with Liz Moorehead. The podcast explores what it means to live beyond default settings - beyond what we're told to accept, reaching for something bigger and greater.
keyPoints: Focuses on personal transformation and self-belief
Features the Superhuman Framework with 4 Cornerstones: Love, Purpose, Passion, and Persistence
Available on iHeart, Amazon Music, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Google Podcasts
quotes: For those of you who want to get a hand up in life and show up as a whole-ass human!
Living beyond what we're told to accept, beyond the day-to-day monotony

sources.title: Beyond Your Default - iHeart Radio
sources.summary: Beyond Your Default podcast on iHeart Radio featuring episodes on the Superhuman Framework, including the 4 Cornerstones episode exploring Love, Purpose, Passion, and Persistence.
keyPoints: 4 Cornerstones episode explores foundational elements for fulfilling life
Episodes on time management and life perspective
Blessing Bombers episode on human connections
quotes: The keys to building a fulfilling, resilient life beyond the default

sources.title: What Is the Beyond Your Default Podcast? - George B. Thomas Article
sources.summary: George B. Thomas's article explaining the origin, purpose, and vision of the Beyond Your Default podcast, sharing his personal journey of transformation and self-belief.
keyPoints: Explains the 'why' behind starting the podcast
Discusses importance of integrating all parts of oneself

sources.title: Marketing Smarts Podcast - MarketingProfs
sources.summary: George B. Thomas hosts the Marketing Smarts podcast for MarketingProfs, delivering 30-minute weekly episodes with actionable insights and interviews with marketing experts on topics including SEO, AI, content marketing, social media, and email marketing.
keyPoints: Covers B2B marketing topics: SEO, AI, content marketing, social media
Also hosts Marketing Smarts Live Show
Featured guests include Matt Treacey, Vin Turk, Jason Harris, Marcus Sheridan, Christopher Penn
quotes: Delivers actionable insights and real advice to help you market smarter

sources.title: The Hubcast Podcast (271 Episodes)
sources.summary: George B. Thomas recorded 271 episodes of The Hubcast, the first HubSpot-specific podcast, co-hosted with Marcus Sheridan. The podcast was 20-25 minutes per episode, recorded via Skype with Ecamm Call Recorder.
keyPoints: Started after Marcus Sheridan encouraged George despite his initial hesitation
Used ATR 2100 microphone, Libsyn hosting, Blubrry plugin
quotes: Hubcast Episode 1: Finally, a Podcast Just for HubSpotters!
George initially resisted because he 'hated his voice'

sources.title: The Spot Podcast - George B. Thomas Introduction Interview
sources.summary: Max Cohen interviews George B. Thomas from Sprocket Talk on The Spot Podcast, flipping the script to learn about George's background, experience, and approach to HubSpot.
keyPoints: Max Cohen interviews George B. Thomas
Introduces George to The Spot audience
Discusses Sprocket Talk origins and mission

sources.title: The Spot Podcast - What Makes A Great Marketer?
sources.summary: George B. Thomas co-hosts The Spot Podcast EP21 with Doug Davidoff, Juli Durante, and Max Cohen, discussing what makes a great marketer.

sources.title: 15-Minute Strategy Podcast - Sprocket Talk
sources.summary: George B. Thomas hosted the 15-Minute Strategy Podcast through Sprocket Talk, uncovering challenges faced by sales, marketing, and service professionals with strategies to overcome their biggest hurdles.
keyPoints: Focus on sales, marketing, and service challenges
quotes: Every week, George B. Thomas uncovers the challenges that sales, marketing and service professionals face

sources.title: Sprocket Talk Unpacked
sources.summary: George B. Thomas co-hosted Sprocket Talk Unpacked with Remington Begg, discussing HubSpot tools and features in detail.

sources.title: AI Digital Clone Episode - The AI Hat Podcast
sources.summary: George B. Thomas appeared on The AI Hat Podcast with host Mike Allton, discussing AI digital clones and how to augment team expertise. The conversation covered cloning one's essence beyond content, real use cases for AI augmentation including George's AI clone assisting his team via Slack.
keyPoints: Discusses AI digital clones for business
George's AI clone assists team via Slack
Emphasis on building AI from purpose, not just monetization
Real use cases for AI augmentation

sources.title: Partnership Unpacked - Agorapulse Podcast
sources.summary: George B. Thomas appeared on Partnership Unpacked with host Mike Allton, discussing how he developed close relationships with industry brands like HubSpot and how to develop and nurture brand partnerships.

sources.title: Dial It In Podcast - Carving Your Own Path
sources.summary: George B. Thomas kicked off Season 3 of the Dial It In podcast with hosts Dave and Trygve, discussing his journey from Impulse Creative to launching Sidekick Strategies, challenges of starting his own business, importance of authenticity, and being a 'whole ass human.'
keyPoints: Discusses journey from Impulse Creative to Sidekick Strategies
Focus on business, health, and being genuine
quotes: Show up as your true self and be a 'whole ass human'

sources.title: Video Marketing Value Podcast - Personalized Sales Videos
sources.summary: George B. Thomas discussed personalized video for sales with hosts Dane Golden and others, explaining how one-to-one video can be used across customer service, HR, sales, and marketing.
keyPoints: Personalized video as 'communication at its basic fundamental level'
Emphasis on authenticity over production value
Application across departments: customer service, HR, sales, marketing
quotes: It's not about the production value, it's about how personable you can be
Just get on there with the mindset I'm going to be me because that's who I am. Authenticity totally wins the day in today's market

sources.title: The Absolute Advantage Podcast - Promoting Videos to Enhance Inbound Marketing
sources.summary: Episode 137 of The Absolute Advantage Podcast featuring George B. Thomas discussing how video bridges sales and marketing with digital customers, video signatures on email, and the importance of video in the buyer's journey.
keyPoints: 70% of buyer's journey complete before contact
Former youth pastor and pub bouncer background
quotes: Videos allow them 'to see us, hear us, know us'
A nerd who needs to educate

sources.title: YouTube Creators Hub - Episode 167: It Just Takes One Play
sources.summary: George B. Thomas discusses his HubSpot Sprocket Talk YouTube channel, bringing HubSpot tutorials, updates, and interviews to help users achieve more ROI with their HubSpot accounts.
keyPoints: Discussion of Sprocket Talk YouTube channel

sources.title: ZenPilot - Inbound Agency Journey Episode 001
sources.summary: George B. Thomas was the inaugural guest on ZenPilot's Inbound Agency Journey podcast, sharing his unique path into inbound marketing and his journey working alongside Marcus Sheridan at The Sales Lion.
keyPoints: First episode of Inbound Agency Journey

sources.title: ZenPilot - How Marketing Agencies Can Dominate Video Marketing
sources.summary: George B. Thomas from The Sales Lion discusses how agencies can get started and dominate video marketing, recommending 'They Ask, You Answer' for content strategy.
keyPoints: Types of videos and strategies agencies should pursue

sources.title: Ask the Experts with George B. Thomas - Ecamm
sources.summary: Guest host Stephanie Liu interviews George B. Thomas about video marketing, live video, and Ecamm Live software for content creation.
quotes: Fire up Ecamm Live because I love Ecamm Live and the way that I can record a native video right to my computer in an instant

sources.title: Build A Better Agency Podcast - Agency Management Institute
sources.summary: George B. Thomas appears on the Build A Better Agency podcast presented by HubSpot, discussing video marketing for agencies. Described as having an infectious passion for video.
keyPoints: Focus on video as next step in inbound marketing evolution
Background as youth pastor and pub bouncer
quotes: This guy gets video and has a passion around it that is infectious
Video is the next step of the inbound marketing evolution

sources.title: How HubSpot Makes Agency Owners' Lives Easier - Craig Cody Podcast
sources.summary: George B. Thomas shares how agency owners can integrate and implement HubSpot tools into their systems and processes to streamline sales and marketing.

sources.title: George B. Thomas Podchaser Profile
sources.summary: Podchaser profile showcasing all of George B. Thomas's podcast credits and appearances, including hosted episodes, guest interviews, and behind-the-scenes work.

sources.title: HubHeroes Community
sources.summary: The unofficial HubSpot community founded through the HubHeroes Podcast, offering live workshops, exclusive events like the HubSpot Content Hotline with George B. Thomas and Liz Moorehead.

notableGuestAppearances: The AI Hat Podcast - AI Digital Clones
Build A Better Agency - Video for Agencies
keyThemes: Personal growth and the Superhuman Framework
